languages.text: "Ахем... милейшая, разве вам не поручили присматривать за Вольным Торговцем?!"

languages.original_text: "Hmph... My dear, were you not the one assigned to watch over the Rogue Trader?"

languages.text: «Ejem... Señorita, le había sido encomendado vigilar {rt_mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente, ¿no es así?».
languages.original_text: "Hmph... My dear, were you not the one assigned to watch over the Rogue Trader?"

languages.text: "Hıh... Canım, senin Hür Tacir'e göz kulak olman gerekmiyor muydu?"
languages.original_text: "Hmph... My dear, were you not the one assigned to watch over the Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Hıh... Canım, senin Hür Tacir'e göz kulak olman gerekmiyor muydu?"

languages.text: 「ふん…ローグトレーダーを見張る任に就いていたのは、あなたではなかったか？」
languages.original_text: "Hmph... My dear, were you not the one assigned to watch over the Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: 「ふん…ローグトレーダーを見張る任に就いていたのは、あなたではなかったか？」

languages.text: « Hmph... N'aviez-vous pas pour mission de veiller sur {rt_mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ? »
languages.original_text: "Hmph... My dear, were you not the one assigned to watch over the Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: « Hmph... N'aviez-vous pas pour mission de veiller sur {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ? »
